label: 荘園
本: Land, Power, and the Sacred The Estate System in Medieval Japan . University of Hawai'i Press . 2018
著者: Goodwin, Janet R. (ed.)/ Piggott, Joan R. (ed.)
説明文: a landed estate, characterized by shared rights (shiki) to income from the land. Supreme authority over a shōen was exercised by a powerful individual, house, or religious institution, rather than by the court government.
